mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Leading iPaaS solution for hybrid enterprise integration, focusing on API-led connectivity and SOA. Complete platform for APIs, applications, and products with Mule as core runtime engine. Strong competitor for cloud integration workloads.

mentionedBy.name: SPS Commerce Inc.
